00026 #ifndef UPLOADBANDWIDTHTHROTTLER_H
00027 #define UPLOADBANDWIDTHTHROTTLER_H
00028 
00029 
00030 #include <wx/thread.h>
00031 
00032 #include <deque>
00033 
00034 #include "Types.h"
00035 
00036 class ThrottledControlSocket;
00037 class ThrottledFileSocket;
00038 
00039 class UploadBandwidthThrottler : public wxThread 
00040 {
00041 public:
00042     UploadBandwidthThrottler();
00043     ~UploadBandwidthThrottler();
00044     
00045     uint64 GetNumberOfSentBytesSinceLastCallAndReset();
00046     uint64 GetNumberOfSentBytesOverheadSinceLastCallAndReset();
00047 
00048     void AddToStandardList(uint32 index, ThrottledFileSocket* socket);
00049     bool RemoveFromStandardList(ThrottledFileSocket* socket);
00050 
00051     void QueueForSendingControlPacket(ThrottledControlSocket* socket, bool hasSent = false);
00052     void RemoveFromAllQueues(ThrottledControlSocket* socket);
00053     void RemoveFromAllQueues(ThrottledFileSocket* socket);
00054 
00055     void EndThread();
00056 private:
00057     void DoRemoveFromAllQueues(ThrottledControlSocket* socket);
00058     bool RemoveFromStandardListNoLock(ThrottledFileSocket* socket);
00059 
00060     void* Entry();
00061     
00062     bool m_doRun;
00063 
00064 
00065     wxMutex m_sendLocker;
00066     wxMutex m_tempQueueLocker;
00067     
00068     typedef std::deque<ThrottledControlSocket*> SocketQueue;
00069     
00070     // a queue for all the sockets that want to have Send() called on them.
00071     SocketQueue m_ControlQueue_list;
00072     // a queue for all the sockets that want to have Send() called on them.
00073     SocketQueue m_ControlQueueFirst_list;
00074     // sockets that wants to enter m_ControlQueue_list 
00075     SocketQueue m_TempControlQueue_list;
00076     // sockets that wants to enter m_ControlQueue_list and has been able to send before 
00077     SocketQueue m_TempControlQueueFirst_list; 
00078 
00079 
00080     typedef std::deque<ThrottledFileSocket*> FileSocketQueue;
00081     // sockets that have upload slots. Ordered so the most prioritized socket is first
00082     FileSocketQueue m_StandardOrder_list; 
00083 
00084     uint64 m_SentBytesSinceLastCall;
00085     uint64 m_SentBytesSinceLastCallOverhead;
00086 };
